name: deid-export
label: De-identified Export
description: Profile-based anonymization and export of files within a project. Files within the source project will be anonymized (according to a required template) and exported to a specified project. Output is a csv file reporting the status of all exported items.
author: Flywheel, Inc.

deid_profile.description: A Flywheel de-identification profile specifying the de-identification actions to perform.

subject_csv.description: A CSV file that contains mapping values to apply for subjects during de-identification.

project_path.description: The resolver path of the destination project (E.g., 'flywheel/test').

overwrite_files.description: If true, existing files in destination containers will be overwritten if a file to be exported has the same filename.
